extension.category: Checks integrity of the JORAM diagram.

constraints.constraint: ScalAgentServer.allInstances()->forAll(j | j.sid = self.sid implies j = self) Checks unicity of server id. Server Id (sid) must be unique.
NetworkDomain.allInstances()->forAll(n | n.name = self.name implies n = self) Checks unicity of domain name. Domain name must be unique.
name.size() > 0 descr TODO Domain name can't be empty
self.network->forAll(c1,c2 | c1.port = c2.port implies c1 = c2) TODO Server is linked with two different domains using the same port.

services->select(f | f.oclIsKindOf(TCPProxyService))->notEmpty() implies services->select(f | f.oclIsKindOf(ConnectionManager))->notEmpty() TODO TCPProxyService can't work without a ConnectionManager service.
